arbiter.name: The Arbiter
arbiter.description: You are a powerful, obstinate vagabond, serving as somewhere between a mercenary and a protector, perhaps taking sides too easily in the greater conflict between the factions.
details: faded military insignia, eyepatch, repaired clothes, tarnished locket

nature.name: Defender
nature.description: Clear your exhaustion track when you put yourself in harm’s way to defend someone against injustice or dire threat.

nature.name: Punisher
nature.description: Clear your exhaustion track when you tell a powerful or dangerous villain to their face that you will punish them.

why: I’m being hunted by a powerful official
I wish to make up for a past transgression
I must clear my tarnished name
I have been exiled from most clearings

adventurer.name: The Adventurer
adventurer.description: You are a peaceful, diplomatic vagabond, making allies from those you aid, perhaps toppling greater powers by forging strong bonds with others.
details: medal of service, beaded jewelry, carved flute, pouches with pretty stones

nature.name: Extrovert
nature.description: Clear your exhaustion track when you share a moment of real warmth, friendship, or enjoyment with someone.

nature.name: Peacemaker
nature.description: Clear your exhaustion track when you resolve a dangerous conflict nonviolently.

harrier.name: The Harrier
harrier.description: You are a quick, enterprising vagabond, racing easily from building to building and clearing to clearing without anything stopping you, perhaps finding yourself in places others would rather keep secret or hidden.
details: half-started maps, sewn bandana, ball and cup, wide-brimmed hat

nature.name: Dutiful
nature.description: Clear your exhaustion track when you take on a dangerous or difficult task on behalf of another.

nature.name: Competitive
nature.description: Clear your exhaustion track when you take dramatically unnecessary risks to show off.

ranger.name: The Ranger
ranger.description: You are a capable, stealthy vagabond, centered on the forests that fill the Woodland between the clearings, more interested in the wilds than in the company of other Woodland denizens or their society.
details: forest charm, leafy cloak, smoking pipe, stolen ring

nature.name: Loner
nature.description: Clear your exhaustion track when you enter a dangerous situation alone, without backup or assistance.

nature.name: Cynic
nature.description: Clear your exhaustion track when you openly and directly ask dangerous questions about an accepted “truth”.

ronin.name: The Ronin
ronin.description: You are a skilled, willful vagabond, formerly a servant of a lord in a different land, now masterless. You came to the Woodland to live as a free vagabond.
details: lord’s token, mark of esteem, stringed instrument, board game

nature.name: Survivor
nature.description: Clear your exhaustion track when you try to flee or cover allies’ flight from a dangerous or overwhelming situation.

nature.name: Pilgrim
nature.description: Clear your exhaustion track when you find an expert in a skill you don’t possess.

scoundrel.name: The Scoundrel
scoundrel.description: You are a lucky, dangerous vagabond, acting more as destroyer and troublemaker than anything else, perhaps creating chaos and destruction for its own sake.
details: full face mask, mousesteel spark lighter, overly large coat, sulphurous pouches

nature.name: Arsonist
nature.description: Clear your exhaustion track when you use needlessly destructive or damaging methods to solve a problem.

nature.name: Combative
nature.description: Clear your exhaustion track when you try to start a fight against overwhelming opposition.

thief.name: The Thief
thief.description: You are a cunning, criminal vagabond, capable of stealing even the most well-guarded treasures, perhaps committed to crime and theft for its own sake.
details: black cape, large bag, old broken weapon, stolen scarf

nature.name: Kleptomaniac
nature.description: Clear your exhaustion track when you try to selfishly steal something valuable or important.

nature.name: Rebellious
nature.description: Clear your exhaustion track when you grievously insult, defy, or anger figures of authority.

tinker.name: The Tinker
tinker.description: You are an adept, clever vagabond, interested in mechanisms and craftsmanship, perhaps possessed of ideas that separate you from those around you.
details: eccentric tool belt, beautiful whetstone, former patron’s insignia, massive packs

nature.name: Perfectionist
nature.description: Clear your exhaustion track when you replace someone else’s existing tool or resource with something truly great.

nature.name: Radical
nature.description: Clear your exhaustion track when you espouse dangerous ideas to the wrong audience.

vagrant.name: The Vagrant
vagrant.description: You are a charming, survivor vagabond, using words to get out of dangerous situations, perhaps even setting possible predators upon each other to keep them away from yourself.
details: stolen military insignia, tattered cloak, luck charm, gambling paraphernalia

nature.name: Glutton
nature.description: Clear your exhaustion track when you overindulge on vices like drink, food, and gambling.

nature.name: Hustler
nature.description: Clear your exhaustion track when you try to spring a con on a powerful or dangerous mark.
